title: Best Lee Sin Skin idea
body:
As we all know LeeSin a a fighter and a good one at that. 
So my idea for a Lee Sin skin is this......"Muhammad a-Lee Sin" instead of Muhammad ali the famous boxer.
So of course he has to have an afro and wear boxing shorts with big boxing gloves. Plus all his basic attacts should look like boxing jabs and upper cuts.

When you make this skin and put it into the game, I would love one for free please :)

replies.body: Ha ha fair enough..... but i just thought it was funny and a possible idea for the future

no more lee skins for god sake. he has so many y give him another. zac only has his release skin and the only way lee is ever getting a new skin is when riot nerfs him to the ground the day before the skin is released
but yes this skin would be awesome

The thing about zac (and xerath to a degree) is that there is only so much you can do in addition to changing their colour palette.

I got all xer skins but they feel a bit samey if I am perfectly honest.

Just cant see much happening for zac because of the nature of his character.
